channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update Structure Fire; INC#0260; 06:52AM; 11455 W Cumpston St; MAP: https://bit.ly/42rUn25; North Hollywood; Building type update: The original fire unit (appears to be) an apartment building which was in the framing stags and fully involved in fire upon LAFD arrival. The Alpha side (to the front) exposure was also under construction (appears to be apartments) and sustained some fire damage. The exposures surrounding the fire building (on the Brave, Charlie and Delta sides) were defended from any damage and all occupants (numbers unknown) are being rehoused with no injuries reported. The cause is under investigation. No further details.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 BC5 CM40 CM42 E102 E108 E227 E235 E239 E260 E261 E278 E289 E60 E76 E77 E86 E89 E97 EA1 EM14 HR3 RA60 RA86 RA889 RA89 T27 T35 T39 T60 T61 T78 T89 UR88 UR89; CH8; 13 18; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0260; 06:30AM; 11455 W Cumpston St; MAP: https://bit.ly/42rUn25; North Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: 100 firefighters extinguished the fire in 47 minutes with no injuries reported. The three story building was in the framing stages of construction and was well involved in fire upon LAFD arrival. Firefighters successfully defended the surrounding buildings from an extension, preventing the displacement of those occupants. LAFD apparatus will remain on scene through the morning conducting overhaul and ensuring all hot spots are extinguished. Commuters are advised to avoid Cumpston St between Camellia Ave and Tujunga Ave. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 BC5 CM40 CM42 E102 E108 E227 E235 E239 E260 E261 E278 E289 E60 E76 E77 E86 E89 E97 EA1 EM14 HR3 RA60 RA86 RA889 RA89 T27 T35 T39 T60 T61 T78 T89 UR88 UR89; CH9; 13 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0260; 05:43AM; 11455 W Cumpston St; MAP: https://bit.ly/42rUn25; #NorthHollywood; Three-story apartment under construction, with heavy fire showing. Defensive mode.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 BC5 CM40 CM42 E102 E108 E227 E235 E239 E260 E261 E278 E289 E60 E76 E77 E86 E89 E97 EA1 EM14 HR3 RA60 RA86 RA889 RA89 T27 T35 T39 T60 T61 T78 T89 UR88 UR89; CH9; 13 18; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0121; 02:10AM; 444 S Boyle Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/401qgNb; #BoyleHeights; Firefighters battled for 54 minutes to extinguish the stubborn flames which were embedded throughout the vacant two-story house, including in the floors, walls, and attic. It took the relentless effort of 76 LAFD firefighters to completely snuff out the flames, using defensive, then transitional, and finally offensive tactics. Thankfully, there were no reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E17 E2 E202 E203 E209 E220 E25 E3 E4 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA2 RA25 RA3 RA4 RA803 SQ21 T2 T20 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 14 15 16; Nicholas Prange

Update Structure Fire; INC#0121; 02:50AM; 444 S Boyle Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/401qgNb; #BoyleHeights; After 40 minutes, firefighters continue to battle the flames in the two-story home. The fire ground tactics have been mostly defensive so far, but firefighters are starting to cautiously make entry into the heavily damaged structure to get better access with hose streams.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E17 E2 E202 E203 E209 E220 E25 E3 E4 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA2 RA25 RA3 RA4 RA803 SQ21 T2 T20 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 14 15 16; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0121; 02:10AM; 444 S Boyle Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/401qgNb; #BoyleHeights; Two-story single-family home with heavy fire showing.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E2 E202 E25 RA2 SQ21 T2; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0103; 02:03AM; 9524 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/42rpHhg; #BroadwayManchester; *Corrected Address* It took 28 firefighters 15 minutes to extinguish the flames inside of a one-story commercial building. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E221 E233 E264 E57 E64 E65 RA264 RA64 RA864 SQ21 T21 T33 T64; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0103; 01:48AM; 9526 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/42rpHhg; #BroadwayManchester; One-story commercial building with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E264 E64 E65 RA64 T64; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1673; 10:45PM; 14379 W Tyler St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YX0f0g; #Sylmar; It took 31 firefighters 21 minutes to extinguish the fire inside of a one-story single-family home. Sadly, despite paramedics' best efforts to revive her, one woman (approximately 75 years old) was beyond medical help and declared dead at the scene. LAFD's Fire Investigators are responding for a cause investigation. MEDIA: LAFD PIO Firefighter David Ortiz is en route, ETA 12:05am.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E18 E275 E289 E298 E91 EM15 PI2 RA18 RA891 RA91 RA98 T75 T89 T98; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1635; 10:40PM; 1125 W 6th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nax7Fu; #Westlake; It took 84 firefighters 26 minutes to extinguish heavy fire on the fourth floor and small amounts of fire on other floors of the vacant five-story office building. Fire investigators are en route to attempt to determine the fire's cause. No reported injuries. ; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E1 E10 E11 E203 E209 E210 E211 E220 E227 E27 E3 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA11 RA209 RA27 RA3 RA803 RA827 SQ21 T10 T11 T20 T27 T3 T9 UR27 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange
